text: [Applause]
more than 20,000 people around the world
claim the same set of symptoms sores to
cover the body chronic fatigue and
strangest of all mysterious multicolored
fibers that seemed to sprout from under
their skin
in 2008 Tina in brescia from California
discovered she also had these strange
fibers I hadn't like almost ribbons
coming out of my tongue that weren't
microscopic at all some of them are long
they're all wrapped up on each other and
they just they just come out it's like a
horror movie it is like a science
fiction horror movie
pharmacology professor Randy Wymore has
studied these fibers in his attempt to
understand the condition when I first
started this research I thought that the
fibers were really held the key to this
condition yeah identify what the fibers
are we can figure out where they come
from the medical establishment argues
that the fibers are nothing more than
textiles from clothing embedded in the
open sores
to investigate this professor Wymore has
taken fibers from 20 Morgellons disease
sufferers by comparing them with a
police forensic database of known
materials he hopes to find out what they
could be the first database has around
1200 fibers essentially every known
fiber that's used commercially the
results are a complete surprise
shockingly the fibers didn't match
anything in the database
the mystery fibers don't appear to be
textiles of any kind they don't come
from clothes carpets or home furnishings
we still don't know what those fibers
are made out of
